title: PSA-7 1910 P2 TY COBB Sweet Caporal
author: Jay Wolt

posts.post_title: PSA-7 1910 P2 TY COBB Sweet Caporal
posts.post_content:
P2 TY COBB PSA-7

I sold this on eBay on Dec 1st '08 at $561.88 + shipping
which was lower then I anticipated.

It is back in my hands as I bought it back from the buyer.

VCP has my transaction as well as 6 others, the average price
for the 7 PSA-7 (small letter) Cobb's is $967.49


Paypal OK, no Fee
An affordable near 100 year old NM Cobb piece.

Email link ... [url]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/url] 

Now listed on eBay
